input.sentences: the high school had their fall pep rally parade today .
the students were pumped and showed their school spirit .
the homecoming candidates were driving in nice cars .
[female] and [male] look excited in their vintage ride .
the local fire department loaned out one of their older trucks to the school for the event .
output.sentences: The local school held a pep rally
Some of the students were driving nice cars for the homecoming parade
There were several vintage rides driven by males
The local fire truck participated in the parade for the school
